testcase.name: TC_001 As a vendor, email, and password must be entered and My Account must appear in the system
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to Hubcomfy.................................................passed And User clicks Sign In.....................................................passed And User enters a valid email in the email box..............................passed And User enters the valid password in the password box......................passed And User click the SIGN IN button...........................................passed Then The user confirms that they went to the My Account page................passed And User quits page.........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC_002 As a vendor, email, and password must be entered and My Account must appear in the system(Negative Test)
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to Hubcomfy.................................................passed And User clicks Sign In.....................................................passed And User enters "16project.qa@gmail.com" and "02Team.20" from use cases.....passed And User click the SIGN IN button...........................................passed Then User confirms that they cannot go to the My Account page...............passed And User quits page.........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC_003 Orders, Downloads, addresses, account information, who list and Checkout should be visible
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to Hubcomfy.................................................passed And User clicks Sign In.....................................................passed And User enters a valid email in the email box..............................passed And User enters the valid password in the password box......................passed And User click the SIGN IN button...........................................passed And Click on the My Account link............................................passed Then Verifies the visibility of Orders......................................passed Then Corrects the visibility of the Downloads text..........................passed Then Verifies the visibility of Addresses...................................passed Then Verifies the visibility of Account details.............................passed Then Verifies the visibility of the Wishlist text...........................passed Then Verifies the visibility of the Logout text.............................passed And User quits page.........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC_004 Under the Dashboard; Store manager, orders, downloads, addresses, account details, appointments,
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to Hubcomfy.................................................passed And User clicks Sign In.....................................................passed And User enters a valid email in the email box..............................passed And User enters the valid password in the password box......................passed And User click the SIGN IN button...........................................passed And Click on the My Account link............................................passed Then Store manager confirms that the text is there..........................passed Then Then orders confirm that the text is there.............................passed Then Downloads confirm that the text is there...............................passed Then Addresses confirm that there is writing................................passed Then Confirms the existence of account details..............................passed Then Confirms that there is an Appointments sign............................passed Then Wishlist confirms that there is writing................................passed Then Confirms that there are support tickets................................passed Then Followings confirms that the text exists...............................passed Then Confirms that there is a logout sign...................................passed
